import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a ring group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/v1/domains/{domain_uuid}/ring-groups/{ring_group_uuid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing ring group in the specified domain.

Notes:
- Fields are optional. If omitted, the current value is unchanged.
- If `members` is present:
  - members omitted =&gt; no change
  - members: [] =&gt; deletes all members
  - members: [...] =&gt; replaces all members
- The response payload matches the `show` endpoint shape.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"domain_uuid","description":"The domain UUID.","example":"7d58342b-2b29-4dcf-92d6-e9a9e002a4e5","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"in":"path","name":"ring_group_uuid","description":"The ring group UUID.","example":"40aec3e8-a572-40da-954b-ddf6a8a65324","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ring_group_name":{"type":"string","description":"Ring group display name. Must not be greater than 75 characters.","example":"Sales Ring Group"},"ring_group_extension":{"type":"number","description":"Numeric ring group extension number (must be unique within the domain).","example":9000},"ring_group_greeting":{"type":"string","description":"Optional greeting recording reference/filename for the ring group.","example":"sales-greeting.wav"},"ring_group_strategy":{"type":"string","description":"Ring strategy. Default: enterprise.","example":"sequence","enum":["enterprise","simultaneous","sequence","random","rollover"]},"timeout_action":{"type":"string","description":"Optional no-answer action.","example":"voicemails","enum":["extensions","ring_groups","ivrs","business_hours","contact_centers","faxes","conferences","call_flows","voicemails","recordings","check_voicemail","company_directory","hangup"]},"timeout_target":{"type":"string","description":"Optional no-answer target (required for many fallback_action values). For voicemails, this is the mailbox.","example":"101"},"ring_group_cid_name_prefix":{"type":"string","description":"Optional caller ID name prefix applied to calls coming from this ring group. Must not be greater than 20 characters.","example":"Sales"},"ring_group_cid_number_prefix":{"type":"string","description":"Optional caller ID number prefix applied to calls coming from this ring group. Must not be greater than 20 characters.","example":"9"},"ring_group_description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional ring group description/label. Must not be greater than 150 characters.","example":"Main sales queue (ring group)"},"ring_group_forward_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether call forwarding is active for the ring group. Defaults to false if omitted.","example":false},"forward_action":{"type":"string","description":"Forward action. This field is required when <code>ring_group_forward_enabled</code> is <code>true</code>.","example":"ring_groups","enum":["extensions","ring_groups","ivrs","business_hours","contact_centers","faxes","conferences","call_flows","voicemails","external"]},"forward_target":{"type":"string","description":"Forward target for non-external forward_action values (e.g., an extension).","example":"456"},"forward_external_target":{"type":"string","description":"Forward target when forward_action=external (digits, may include a single leading +).","example":"+12135551212"},"ring_group_caller_id_name":{"type":"string","description":"Optional forced caller ID name for outbound calls from this ring group. Must not be greater than 20 characters.","example":"ABC Corporation"},"ring_group_caller_id_number":{"type":"string","description":"Optional forced caller ID number for outbound calls from this ring group.","example":"+12135550100"},"ring_group_distinctive_ring":{"type":"string","description":"Optional distinctive ring to apply. Must not be greater than 30 characters.","example":"ring4"},"ring_group_ringback":{"type":"string","description":"Ringback tone or tone variable. Default: ${us-ring}.","example":"${us-ring}"},"ring_group_call_forward_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to honor member call-forward settings. Default to the domain setting if omitted.","example":true},"ring_group_follow_me_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to honor member follow-me settings. Defaults to the domain setting if omitted.","example":true},"members":{"type":"array","description":"Optional list of ring group members. If provided, destinations are created in this order.","example":[{"destination_number":"100","destination_delay":0,"destination_timeout":25,"destination_prompt":false,"destination_enabled":true}],"items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["ring_group_name","ring_group_extension"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
